definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The invertebrate takes itsname from the equally flashy terrestrial anemone flower.
sentences.chinese: 它和陆地生物银莲花一样，得名于它的华丽。

sentences.english: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.chinese: 这朵银莲花是我最喜爱的植物之一。

sentences.english: The wild anemones in the woods in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月里森林中野生的银莲花。

sentences.english: The origin of the beautiful words about silver-colored lotus is to come from Greek myth.
sentences.chinese: 关于银莲花的花语的由来是源自希腊的神话。

sentences.english: The anemones of Japan and the tall asters lie down a little bit in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 日本和高紫苑的银莲花躺下稍微腐蚀雨。

sentences.english: Study on Resources of Medicinal Plant Anemone L. in Chongqing;
sentences.chinese: 本文简要综述了银莲花属植物的化学和药理研究。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on the photosynthetic characteristics of some Anemone species;
sentences.chinese: 本文简要综述了银莲花属植物的化学和药理研究。

sentences.english: Studies on pollen morphology of Anemone L.
sentences.chinese: 银莲花属花粉形态的研究。

definition: red spider lily (Lycoris radiata)/Sanskrit mañjusaka/cluster amaryllis
